questions.question_text: Which COBIT design factor is broken down into first mover, follower and laggard strategies?

discussion.content:
A
From COBIT Foundation book - "The enterprise uses DevOps working methods for software building,
deployment and operations"

questions.question_text: Which of the following is an IT implementation method design factor that focuses on software building, deployment and operations?
Innovation and differentiation are examples of:

discussion.content:
B.
Innovation/Differentiation The enterprise has a focus on offering different and/or innovative products
and services to their clients.
Figura 4.5—Factor de diseño de estrategia de la empresa

comments.content: I changed my mind. it is D :)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
I think it is A
Correct Answer: A. Forms the basis of a process capability assessment for the Capability Dimension

choices.D: Provides the basis to undertake an assessment on the process dimension
choices.C: Provides the basis for one or more Process Assessment Models
choices.A: Forms the basis of a process capability assessment for the Capability Dimension
choices.B: Provides the mechanism whereby defined Process Assessment Models ire related to the measurement framework

questions.question_text: Which is NOT a purpose of the Process Reference Model?

discussion.content:
C.
EG01
Portfolio of competitive
products and services
 Percent of products and services that meet or exceed
targets in revenues and/or market share
 Percent of products and services that meet or exceed
customer satisfaction targets
 Percent of products and services that provide competitive
advantage

choices.B: Optimization of internal business process functionality
choices.C: Portfolio of competitive products and services
